description: I always looked for an program where I can paste Latex formulas into my presentation/documents in LibreOffice and GoogleDocs. This program does the trick and offers great functionality!

Gummy is a pretty complete LATEX environment, no need to call to much packages or theme, so the fact that we cannot drag or copy formulas into it from KLatexFormula is a shame. This issue is old, but never got fixed.
summary: Cannot drag nor copy formulas into Gummy which uses LATEX environment

description: I use it to paste equations in other environments like drawings, or powerpoint (don't judge me, I need to share it with no linux users :( ). I know beamer rocks, but this is an useful solution.
I use it for presentations and documents. It renders Latex equations easily and very fast
